page.title: 17HOUSES
page.content: Because of a change in government policy many people have bought the houses they live in from the council. The private houses were begun on the north side of the Wigton road in the 1960's and the estate is still expanding today.Many of the houses were built to individual designs and look very modern.There is a large comprehensive school on the estate and some council houses. The estates have shops,churches,pubs and schools.The community is generally thriving and this is reflected in the well maintained look of the area.
